title: Easy sign-in
body: Create multiple sign-in flows that ask different questions based on the purpose of the guestâ€™s visit.

title: Instant notifications
body: Automatically notify employees when their guests arrive.

title: Visitor screening
body: Set criteria visitors must meet to come on-site, including proof of vaccination and watch list screening..

title: Analytics and reporting
body: Get insight into visitor volume, who hosts visitors and more. Export data in a few clicks..

title: Registration
body: Add upcoming visitors to let your team know who to expect and email guests information about their visit.

title: Photo capture
body: Ask guests to take a photo so their host can greet them with confidence.

title: Digital document signing
body: Prompts guests to sign agreements, like NDAs and waivers, on the iPad during sign in.

title: Badge printing
body: Automatically print badges when visitors sign in. Even create custom badges.
